description:
Hand-built in Indonesia from solid oak, the June cabinet turns storage into a showcase. A sun-washed finish, shiplap back paneling and antiqued reeded hardware give it the soul of a found vintage piece.

Glass doors open to three upper shelves (two adjust) for treasures, while the lower cupboard hides media gear behind cord-ready panels. Brass-capped feet finish the look.

Sturdy, timeless, and ready to elevate any room.
title: June Oak Display Cabinet

description:
Meet the June Sideboard, a stunning fusion of modern design and traditional Indonesian craftsmanship. Expertly built from solid oak wood and veneers, each piece features a unique hand-applied finish that celebrates the wood's natural grain and character.

Its sophisticated interior boasts a shiplap back panel and contrasting finishes, while two adjustable shelves (one behind each door) offer versatile storage. Practical details include discreet cord management holes for electronics and a sleek, grounded plinth base.
title: June Solid Oak Sideboard

description:
Meet the sideboard that makes storage look effortless. Solid white oak, sun-kissed Honey finish, and a cool slab of white marble team up for a piece that’s as sturdy as it is stunning.

Two roomy cabinets hide adjustable shelves—perfect for dishes, barware, or binge-watching gear—while self-closing doors and built-in cord ports keep everything sleek and silent. Brass-finished zinc pulls add the final touch of quiet luxury.

Craftsman-built with mortise-and-tenon joints and protective lacquer, Asher stands level on any floor and ready for years of compliments.
title: Asher Honey Oak Sideboard with Marble Top

description:
Meet the Seminyak: a slim console sculpted from reclaimed teak, then flame-kissed using the Japanese Shou Sugi Ban technique. The result is a deep, smoldering black that still lets the wood’s grain shine through.

No two boards are alike—expect knots, splits, and warm brown flashes that survived the burn. A hand-rubbed wax finish locks in the look and shrugs off daily scuffs.

Slide it behind a sofa, in an entryway, or under a wall-mounted TV for instant, earthy edge.
title: Charred Teak Console Table

description:
Meet Asher, the conversation-starting coffee table that marries Nordic pine and oak with a swirl of white marble. A brass-finished zinc base gives it jewelry-box glow while anchoring the whole room.

Hand-stained wood meets stone in reinforced mortise-and-tenon joints—no wobble, just quiet strength. The protective lacquer keeps the glow alive through coffee mornings, game nights, and everything between.

Ready to elevate your lounge? Asher lands fully assembled; just position and admire.
title: Asher Round Marble Coffee Table

description:
Settle into the sublime comfort of the Keegan Glider. Expertly crafted from the world's finest hand-finished leathers, each piece boasts a unique character with natural variations and textures.

Built for lasting performance, its solid hardwood frame and no-sag recycled steel springs provide exceptional support. The plush seat and back cushions are filled with high-density, plant-based foam for cloud-like comfort.

Effortlessly glide or complete a smooth 360-degree swivel to find your perfect position, making it the ideal centerpiece for relaxation and conversation.
title: Keegan Leather Swivel Glider

description:
Hand-forged iron frame meets industrial chic in the Marin Console. A matte-black powder coat locks out rust while lending timeless edge to entryways, sofas or beds.

Choose your top story: shimmering hand-antiqued silver/brass aluminum for vintage glamour, or seamless matte-black aluminum for minimalist muscle. Either way, you get a artisan-built surface that shrugs off keys, mail and morning coffee.

Style hack: Slide baskets underneath for hidden storage, let it float solo as art, or mirror it to double the drama. Narrow depth, big personality.
title: Marin Iron Console Table

description:
Old soul, new story. Hand-built from solid teak, the Everett sideboard wears a hand-painted, wax-sealed finish that feels decades in the making.

Behind every door and drawer you’ll find roomy storage for dishes, barware or board games—perfect for dining rooms that double as hangout zones.

Because the wood’s grain and distressing are done by artisans, no two pieces match—your sideboard is one of one.
title: Everett Teak Sideboard Vintage Brown

description:
Sink into the Valletta—where Italian-tanned aniline leather meets cloud-soft feather wrap. The frame is hardwood forged on recessed iron legs, so it feels solid even when the movie marathon stretches past midnight.

Inside, recycled-steel springs and plant-based foam cushions keep their shape year after year, while the feather topper gives you that irresistible sink-in sigh. Each hide is hand-rubbed to reveal its unique grain, so no two sofas ever tell the same story.

Want a sectional, different leather, or an extra-long chaise? Chat with our Design Team and build the Valletta that fits your life—and your living room—perfectly.
title: Valletta Hand Finished Leather Sofa

description:
Hand-built in Indonesia, the June Bookcase turns solid oak into a show-stopping library. Rich grain, shiplap backing and contrasting interior tones give every shelf gallery-level style.

Brass-capped feet add a hint of warmth while adjustable shelves and rear cord ports let you swap books for tech in seconds. Style meets storage—no compromises.
title: Solid Oak June Bookcase

description:
Sidle this sleek C-table up to sofa or chair for instant surface space. The sculpted aluminum top carries a hand-applied patina that whispers vintage charm, while the iron base—powder-coated for rock-solid durability—keeps everything steady.

Light enough to glide wherever you need it, strong enough to hold coffee, books, or your latest binge-watch snacks. Kyoto: small footprint, big statement.
title: Kyoto Aluminum C Side Table

description:
Raw European history meets modern lines. Each Grady console is sculpted from weathered reclaimed oak, resin-filled cracks tracing decades of story beneath a hand-rubbed sable glaze.

Waterfall mitered edges let the grain dive seamlessly from top to floor, while matte lacquer locks in the rustic-luxe finish. No two boards are alike—expect knots, saw marks and subtle splits that make your entry one of one.

Sturdy 100% oak build, zero assembly fuss. Park it behind a sofa or greet guests at the door—this 14-inch deep silhouette delivers storage without the bulk.
title: Grady Reclaimed Oak Waterfall Console

description:
Meet the Sequoia Sofa, where masterful craftsmanship meets modern elegance. Built with reinforced solid hardwood frames and supported by a no-sag spring system, this sofa is engineered for exceptional durability and day-to-day comfort.

The innovative inset solid wood legs create a stunning floating silhouette, elevating your space with a touch of architectural beauty. Sink into plush, high-density foam seat cushions wrapped in soft poly fibers for the perfect blend of support and cloud-like comfort.

Every detail, from the supportive backrests to the resilient elastic webbing, is designed for a sofa that feels as incredible as it looks.
title: Sequoia Leather Sofa Floating Design

description:
Meet the Huxley: a masterclass in comfort and enduring style. Expertly crafted with a solid hardwood frame and flexible elastic webbing for superior, lasting support.

Sink into plush comfort with dense foam seat cushions padded with soft poly fibers. The generously filled backrest offers perfect lumbar support, making it ideal for your home office or living space.

This is more than a chair—it's a timeless piece built for years of elegant relaxation.
title: Huxley Leather Swivel Chair

description:
Meet Arthur: the sidekick that holds your drink while you shine. Sculpted from solid cast aluminum, each table is hand-antiqued and polished until it glows with a warm, vintage-metal soul.

Because the finish is done by human hands, every surface blooms its own swirl of bronze, pewter and gold—no two ever match, so yours is a limited edition of one.

Sturdy enough for patio parties, sleek enough for sofa-side martinis, Arthur arrives ready to elevate small spaces and big conversations.
title: Arthur Cast Aluminum Martini Table

description:
Meet the statement piece your hallway’s been waiting for. The Asher console pairs solid white oak with a warm honey finish that glows under any light.

Hand-built with old-school mortise-and-tenon joints, it’s sturdy enough for keys, coffee-table books, or your heaviest décor. A brass-finished zinc base adds a quiet flash of metal for modern contrast.

Arrives ready for action—just style and admire.
title: Asher Honey Oak Console Table

description:
Experience ultimate comfort with the Vaughn Power Recliner. Crafted from premium leather and built with a solid hardwood frame, this chair is designed for lasting durability and sophisticated style.

Simply press a button to smoothly recline and elevate the footrest. The plush seat cushion is filled with sterilized down and dense foam, while the high back offers exceptional support with a blend of foam and poly fibers.

Requires electricity and 12" of wall clearance. A 10.5' power cord is included. Contact our Design Team to explore custom leather options and order fabric swatches.
title: Vaughn Leather Power Recliner

description:
Handcrafted by skilled artisans in India, the Nara End Table is a sculptural piece cast from solid aluminum. Its sleek, contemporary lines bring a modern edge to any living space, bedroom, or office nook.

Each table is meticulously hand-polished and plated, then sealed with a protective lacquer to achieve its distinctive subtle sheen and remarkable durability. The captivating drip finish of the Splash Nickel plating creates a unique, fluid texture that catches the light.

More than just a surface, it's a functional work of art designed to complement a wide range of home decor styles from minimalist to industrial chic.
title: Nara Aluminum End Table

description:
Meet the Stonegate: a stunning centerpiece crafted from nature's own art. Each table is a unique slice of history, featuring a solid petrified wood surface sealed in a crystal-clear epoxy resin and hand-polished to a brilliant, smooth finish.

Responsibly sourced and artisan-crafted in the Philippines, no two tables are ever alike. Embrace the unique character of your piece, from its organic patterns and subtle variations in color to the natural fissures and joint lines that tell its one-of-a-kind story.
title: The Stonegate Petrified Wood Coffee Table

description:
Introducing the Hayes Cabinet, where rustic charm meets enduring strength. Expertly crafted from solid pine and reinforced with traditional mortise-and-tenon joinery, this piece is built to be a cherished part of your home for years to come.

Each cabinet is a unique work of art, featuring a hand-painted, lacquer-protected finish that is lovingly distressed. Embrace the character of natural wood grain, small knots, and subtle variations that ensure your piece is wonderfully one-of-a-kind.

  • Antiqued brass hardware accents
  • Four interior shelves (3 fixed, 1 removable)
  • Doors close securely to keep contents tidy
title: Hayes Solid Pine Cabinet

description:
Meet the Rhett Chair, where enduring strength meets elegant design. Crafted from solid reinforced hardwood with an elastic webbing support system, this chair is built to last through years of gatherings and good times.

Its gracefully curved backrest offers exceptional comfort, while the hand-stained finish, sealed with a clear protective lacquer, provides a beautiful and durable sheen. More than just a seat, it's a piece to be admired.
title: Rhett Solid Wood Dining Chair

description:
Meet the chair that outlasts spaghetti night. Wrapped in Cary Linen Performance Fabric, Axel shrugs off stains, odors, and spills while staying cloud-soft.

Solid wood frame, hand-finished in a low-sheen lacquer, gives you heirloom strength without the heir-loom price. Pull it up to the table—or the desk, or the game table—and sit like you mean it.

  • Certified Crypton® Home fabric: wipe-clean, kid-proof, pet-proof
  • Luxe linen look, breathable feel
  • Hand-applied wood finish sealed for life-proof shine
title: Axel Performance Armchair

description:
Invite the whole crew. Solid Indonesian oak stretches from intimate dinners to holiday feasts with smooth built-in leaves that glide open on rack-and-pinion gears—no storage hunt required.

Artisans hand-sand, stain, and lacquer every inch, so the grain glows and each table is one of a kind. Engineered hardwood core keeps it strong for years of second helpings.

Seats 6 closed, 10 extended. Ready to host in under a minute.
title: Waverly Expandable Oak Dining Table

description:
Meet the chair that keeps up with real life. Wrapped in Cary Linen Performance Fabric, Axel shrugs off spills, stains, and everyday chaos while staying soft and inviting.

Crypton® Home fibers lock out moisture and odors, so dinner party mishaps disappear with a quick wipe. A hand-applied, lacquer-sealed finish adds warmth and scratch-proof shine to the solid frame.

Pull it up to the table or use it as a statement accent—Axel looks sharp, feels plush, and cleans easy. Sustainable style, zero stress.
title: Axel Performance Dining Chair

description:
Sit pretty on strength. The Elise dining chair pairs an airy iron silhouette with a velvety powder-coated finish that shrugs off scuffs and spills.

Lightweight yet mighty, its sculpted frame pulls up to any table modern farmhouse to downtown loft without stealing the spotlight. Ready to ship. No assembly required.
title: Elise Powder Coated Iron Dining Chair

description:
Solid oak meets airy rattan in the Maeve armchair—hand-finished for a satin glow and built to outlast every trend. Sink into the cushioned seat, upholstered in your choice of fabric (Crypton® performance options included).

Pick the palette: Black Drifted frame with contrast back or custom stain and fabric. Order a free swatch, then dine in style for decades.
title: Maeve Oak Cane Dining Armchair

description:
Meet Micah: the table that turns every meal into a story. Sculpted from solid walnut, its Vertex base carves out legroom and conversation alike.

Artisan hands shape each plank, so your grain pattern is a fingerprint—no two tables match. Expect knots, subtle shifts, and a finish that warms with every candlelit dinner.

Ready for pancakes, puzzles, or red-wine nights, Micah ships flat and assembles in minutes, then stays beautiful for decades.
title: Micah Walnut Dining Table

description:
Meet the Belmont, a round table that turns every meal into a warm gathering. Solid Finnish pine forms a sculptural pedestal, crowned by a silky oak top that invites lingering conversations.

Hand-finished by artisans, the wood keeps its living character—knots, grain swirls and honeyed tones—so no two tables ever look the same. Compact enough for city lofts, generous enough for Sunday roasts.

Pair it with your favorite chairs and let the stories spin.
title: Belmont Pine & Oak Round Dining Table

description:
Elevate your dining space with the Knox Chair, where industrial edge meets modern comfort. Its bold baseball stitching and rich faux leather upholstery create a striking look built for everyday life.

Built on a sturdy iron frame with a resilient powder-coated finish, this chair is as durable as it is stylish. Experience the perfect blend of form and function for your home.
title: Knox Faux Leather Dining Chair

description:
Meet the Belmont Dining Table, where enduring craftsmanship meets natural beauty. Expertly handcrafted from solid oak and oak veneer, this table is built with a sturdy solid pine base to last for generations.

Each table is a one-of-a-kind piece of art. The hand-applied Siena finish celebrates the wood's unique character—expect subtle knots, grain variations, and natural markings that tell its own story.

This is living furniture. Its warm, organic finish will mature gracefully over time, ensuring your table becomes even more beautiful with the life you share around it.
title: Belmont Solid Oak Dining Table

description:
Solid hardwood meets sculptural comfort. Rhett’s curved backrest cradles you through long dinners, while hand-stained oak and quiet elastic webbing deliver strength without bulk.

A clear lacquer topcoat locks in rich color and a soft, furniture-store glow—no coasters required. Pull it up to the table or let it stand solo; either way, the room looks instantly dressed.

  • Reinforced hardwood frame
  • Flexible webbing seat support
  • Hand-stained & lacquered finish
title: Rhett Curved Back Dining Armchair

description:
Meet the Milo Dining Table, where rustic charm meets artisanal craftsmanship. Each table is a unique statement piece, meticulously handcrafted from solid reclaimed Finnish pine wood and topped with a stunning slab of hand-cut bluestone or white marble.

Our artisans hand-carve the details and apply a hand-stained finish in Ebony, Mocha, or Slate, which is then artfully antiqued and protected with a clear wax lacquer. This process ensures no two tables are exactly alike, celebrating the wood's natural variations, knots, and character marks.

Built for beauty and durability, the Milo table is designed to be the cherished centerpiece of your home for years to come.
title: Milo Artisan Reclaimed Wood Dining Table

description:
Spin into style. Knox’s faux-leather seat and baseball stitching deliver instant diner cool, while the smooth 360° swivel keeps conversations flowing.

Built on a powder-coated iron frame, this stool is engineered for nightly hangs and last-call durability. Just measure counter vs. bar height, pick your size, and pull up a seat.
title: Knox 360 Faux Leather Swivel Stool

description:
Meet the Lyric Chair, where rustic charm meets modern comfort. Its handwoven rattan seat, crafted from natural seagrass, offers a unique texture and breathable comfort. Each chair is built from solid wood—birch for the Black finish, oak for the Natural Weathered, Dark Brown, and Stone Vintage finishes.

Artisan-crafted with love, every piece is unique. The wooden surfaces are hand-finished with layers of paint or stain and a protective lacquer for a subtle, durable sheen. Embrace the natural beauty of organic features like small knots or grain variations, which add to its authentic character.
title: Lyric Rattan Dining Chair

description:
Meet Zephyr: a solid Romanian red oak centerpiece that turns every meal into an event. Hand-stained and sealed with acrylic lacquer, its surface glows with grain that’s literally one-of-a-kind.

Nature signs each top—knots, subtle splits, shifting tones—so no two tables ever repeat. It’s not imperfect; it’s autographed.

Ready for daily feasts, late-night laptops, and everything between. Just wipe, serve, admire.
title: Zephyr Red Oak Dining Table

description:
Pull up a Maeve and stay awhile. Solid oak legs, airy rattan cane and a cushy upholstered seat mingle for a look that’s light, warm and effortlessly cool.

Each frame is hand-finished in protective lacquer—choose classic oak or the moody Black Drifted option with its contrast back. Crypton® performance fabrics and custom colors are just a chat away with our Design Team.

Counter or bar? Measure first, then select the height that fits your space. Grab a free fabric swatch and design the Maeve that feels like it’s always belonged.
title: Maeve Oak Rattan Counter Stool

variants.title: BLACK DRIFTED & NOMAD SNOW / COUNTER STOOL

description:
Meet the Axel Bench: where modern design meets family-friendly durability. Crafted with our exclusive Crypton® Performance Fabric, it's engineered to resist stains, moisture, and odors, making it as practical as it is beautiful.

The hand-finished base is sealed with a protective lacquer for a subtle sheen that complements any dining space. Experience the perfect blend of soft-to-the-touch comfort and unwavering resilience.
title: Axel Modern Dining Bench

description:
Layered Romanian oak and spruce turn every meal into a story. Hand-carved “metal” details add quiet drama, while natural oils make the grain glow.

Choose Vin Rosu for warm brass-tone accents or Walnut for deep bronze highlights. Both finishes are sealed with a soft-sheen lacquer that shrugs off spills.

Each table is one-of-a-kind: no two grain patterns, colors, or carved knots repeat. Seats six comfortably, unforgettable forever.
title: Romanian Oak Layered Dining Table

description:
Meet the Rhett Chair, where modern elegance meets everyday comfort. Its gently curved backrest provides exceptional lumbar support, making it perfect for long dinners and lively conversations.

Built with a solid hardwood frame and flexible elastic webbing, this chair is as durable as it is stylish. The rich, hand-stained finish is sealed with a protective clear lacquer, ensuring your chairs stay beautiful for years to come.
title: Rhett Faux Leather Dining Chair

description:
Pull up a seat that works as hard as you do. The Elise stool marries an iron frame with a tactile powder-coated finish, giving your kitchen island or bar a modern edge that resists everyday scuffs.

Available in counter or bar height—just measure from floor to tabletop and pick the one that fits like it was custom made. No wobble, no worry, only clean lines and strong support.
title: Elise Powder Coated Iron Stool

description:
Meet the Wilder Bed, where modern sustainability meets cloud-like comfort. Its plush upholstery is padded with soft poly fibers and features a supportive core foam crafted from innovative, partially plant-based materials.

Designed for real life, the frame includes thoughtful details like extra space to accommodate mattress variances and make bedding a breeze. For the ultimate sleep setup, we recommend pairing it with our low-profile Retreat 4" Platform.
title: Wilder Upholstered Bed

description:
Sleep in sustainable luxury. The Oakes bed wraps a craftsman-built hardwood frame in stain-proof, soft-touch Crypton® fabric that shrugs off spills and pet paws.

Plant-based foam cushioning gives cloud-like comfort while the tailored headboard turns bedrooms into boutiques—no box spring needed. Tuck bedding neatly and enjoy wiggle room for any standard mattress size.

Make it yours: choose from dozens of fabrics or full-grain leathers. Order a free swatch, then chat with our Design Team to customize.
title: Oakes Performance Upholstered Bed

description:
Wake up to timeless style. The Meave nightstand pairs solid mahogany with petite brass pulls for a refined bedside companion that feels both heirloom and now.

Two solid beech drawers glide shut in whisper-quiet thanks to soft-close metal runners and dovetail joinery. Hand-layered lacquer protects the wood’s natural grain, so every piece tells its own story—no two finishes are ever the same.

Sturdy engineered hardwood reinforcement means this table is ready for stacks of books, late-night cups of tea, and tomorrow’s outfit laid out on top.
title: Meave Solid Mahogany Nightstand

description:
Meet Jules: the bed that turns every night into a five-star stay. A craftsman-built hardwood frame hugs your mattress—no box spring needed—while the wraparound headboard invites late-night reads and lazy Sunday scrolls.

Wrapped in stain-shrugging, odor-blocking Crypton® Home fabric, Jules laughs at coffee spills and pet paws. Tuck bedding neatly into the generous frame for that crisp, boutique-hotel finish.

Want it in sunset ochre or deep-sea teal? Swap fabrics with a quick chat to our Design Team. Grab a free swatch first and fall in love before it reaches your door.
title: Jules Upholstered Bed

description:
Six generous drawers glide open on soft-close metal runners, revealing solid beech interiors built with dovetail joinery. The mahogany frame, reinforced for generations of use, is finished by hand in layered tones and sealed with a low-sheen lacquer.

Brass mini-pulls add a quiet gleam to the wide, clean silhouette. Every dresser is handmade, so grain patterns and color shifts make yours one of a kind.
title: Meave 6 Drawer Mahogany Dresser

description:
Midnight storage, reimagined. A quiet companion that keeps glasses, books and secrets within a single, soft-close drawer wrapped in hand-embossed shagreen leather.

Choose Sparrow walnut or Bone oak—both ride on English dovetail joinery and lacquered hardwood that glows under brushed-metal hardware. The drawer glides like silk, then hushes itself shut while you sleep.

One touch and the night belongs to you.
title: Callahan Shagreen Nightstand

description:
Sleep in rustic elegance. The Rowan pairs hand-finished solid larch and catalpa woods with high-performance Crypton® Nomad Snow fabric that shrugs off spills, stains and pet hair—no box spring needed.

Clean lines hide 5.5" of under-bed storage, while generous frame cavities (61" × 80.75" Queen, 77" × 80.75" King) let bedding tuck in tight for a tailored hotel look every morning.

Sturdy, timeless, worry-proof. Just add your favorite mattress and dream easy.
title: Rowan Solid Wood Performance Fabric Bed

description:
Handcrafted in Indonesia from sustainably harvested solid mindi wood, the Bennett Dresser blends artisanal tradition with modern functionality. Its elegant frame is reinforced with time-tested mortise-and-tenon joinery for exceptional stability that lasts.

Features six spacious drawers with smooth, soft-close glides and dovetail construction. Each drawer front is adorned with hand-carved curved molding, while the interiors are lined with elegant beech wood veneer.

Finished by hand with a rich lacquer coat for protection and a subtle sheen, this piece celebrates natural wood's unique character. Note that small organic features and seasonal movement due to humidity are natural and expected, adding to its authentic charm.
title: Bennett Solid Mindi Wood Dresser

description:
Hand-built in Indonesia from solid ash, the Tatum nightstand brings midnight elegance bedside. A deep ebony stain sinks into every grain, sealed with clear lacquer for a lasting, low-gloss glow.

Brushed brass pulls open two quiet drawers—10¼" and 13¼" wide—giving glasses, books and secrets a stylish hideout. Compact footprint, big on presence.

32" h x 18" w x 16" d. Arrives fully finished; just add your lamp and late-night read.
title: Tatum Ebony Ash Nightstand

description:
Wake up in a frame sculpted from sustainable oak, each grain pattern hand-finished to glow like morning light. The Nerissa marries heirloom craftsmanship with a clean, modern silhouette that anchors any bedroom.

Designed with hidden tolerance for mattress quirks, it lets you skip the box spring and keep a low, hotel-suite profile—perfect for showcasing pillows and tucked-in linens. Slide your mattress in, adjust the height, and sleep easy on a foundation built to last generations.
title: Nerissa Oak Bed

description:
Crafted from solid white oak or Finnish pine, the Asher nightstand pairs hand-stained wood with a one-of-a-kind stone top. Each mineral swirl and vein is nature’s signature—no two tops match.

Two deep drawers glide open on hidden tracks, revealing roomy storage for books, chargers, and midnight essentials. Brass-finished zinc pulls add a quiet gleam, while discreet levelers keep the silhouette steady on any floor.

Mortise-and-tenon joinery and a protective lacquer finish ensure this bedside companion stays beautiful for years of late-night reads and early coffee alarms.
title: Asher Stone Top Nightstand

description:
Meet the Bennett Nightstand, where timeless artisan craftsmanship meets modern functionality. Expertly built from sustainably harvested solid mindi wood, this piece features hand-carved curved molding and a rich, hand-applied lacquer finish that reveals a beautiful, subtle sheen.

Beyond its elegant appearance, it's engineered for exceptional stability with mortise-and-tenon joinery. The spacious dovetail drawer glides smoothly on soft-close mechanisms, and a convenient pull-out tray offers versatile storage. The drawer interior is thoughtfully lined with beech wood veneer.

As a piece made from natural materials, each nightstand is uniquely yours, with variations in grain and tone that celebrate the beauty of organic wood.
title: Bennett Artisan Mindi Wood Nightstand

description:
Sleep in island-made luxury. Sustainably harvested mindi wood is hand-carved, sanded, and lacquered to a warm glow, then wrapped in airy woven cane for instant coastal calm.

Mortise-and-tenon joinery keeps the frame rock-solid, while the 17.75" low footboard and tucked-in rail let bedding drape just right. Choose Queen (61"×81") or King (77"×81"). Pair with our Retreat 8" Platform for the perfect finish.
title: Handcarved Mindi Wood Cane Bed

description:
Meet the dresser that masters the balance of rugged and refined. Six deep drawers glide open on hidden tracks, revealing storage ready for seasons of wardrobes. Hand-built from white oak or Finnish pine, each frame is corner-blocked with old-world mortise-and-tenon joints—no wiggle, no squeak.

A brass-finished zinc pull opens to reveal a stone top that’s one-of-a-kind; natural veining means yours will never have a twin. A hand-rubbed stain and protective lacquer lock in glow while discreet levelers keep everything poised, even on crooked floors.

Simply put: heirloom strength, modern calm.
title: Asher 6 Drawer Solid Wood Dresser

description:
Meet the Asher—hand-built from white oak or Finnish pine and topped with a stain-proof, cloud-soft headboard. No box spring needed; just add mattress and dreams.

Why you’ll love it

  • Mortise-and-tenon joinery = rock-solid frame
  • Crypton® performance fabric shrugs off spills
  • Hand-stained finish sealed in protective lacquer
  • Low profile keeps bedrooms feeling open
title: Asher Solid Wood Upholstered Bed

description:
Storage that steals the show. Six deep drawers wrapped in hand-stained walnut or oak glide open on soft-close slides, revealing English dovetail joinery that’s made to last a lifetime.

Touchable shagreen-embossed leather panels and brushed brass pulls add boutique-hotel glamour without shouting. Pick Sparrow, Caramel, Bone or Manta—each finish is craftsman-built, lacquer-sealed and ready for real life.

Style tip: let it anchor your bedroom, then watch every guest run a hand over the leather and ask “where did you get that?”
title: Callahan 6 Drawer Shagreen Dresser

description:
Hand-built in Indonesia from sustainably harvested mindi wood, this dresser stores a wardrobe behind eleven hand-carved drawers. Dovetail joinery and soft-close glides give every tug a high-end feel, while a lacquered finish protects the warm, rich grain.

Three graduated heights swallow everything from socks to sweaters. Natural knots and splits add character that won’t quit—just like the mortise-and-tenon frame that’s made to move with the seasons, not against them.

  • Solid mindi wood & veneers
  • Dovetail drawers, soft-close
  • Upper: 19.25×15.25×3.75"
  • Middle: 30×15.25×6.75"
  • Bottom: 30×15.25×10.5"
title: 11 Drawer Mindi Wood Dresser

description:
Crafted by Indonesian artisans, the Atlas nightstand pairs solid FSC white oak with airy open storage. A satin lacquer locks in the wire-brushed grain, while champagne brass hardware adds quiet luxury.

English dovetail drawers glide shut in silence, giving bedtime a softer close. Each piece is hand-finished, so no two stands are exactly alike—just like your space.
title: Atlas Oak Open Nightstand

description:
Meet Aurora: the bed that turns every night into a boutique-hotel escape. Hand-built by North Carolina artisans, its frame is solid, cross-directional hardwood certified by the Sustainable Forestry Initiative—good for the planet, even better for your sleep.

The headboard wraps you in cloud-grade comfort: dense, partially plant-based foam topped with silky poly fibers—perfect for late-night reading marathons. A discreet ledge lets bedding tuck in cleanly while forgiving any mattress size quirks.

Skip the box spring for a low, modern profile, or add one for loftier dreams. Either way, Aurora arrives ready to anchor your bedroom in timeless, eco-smart style.
title: Aurora Handcrafted Eco Bed

description:
Meet the Briar Bed, a masterpiece of American craftsmanship built by our North Carolina artisans. Its foundation is a sustainably sourced hardwood frame, certified by the Sustainable Forestry Initiative, ensuring beauty and durability that lasts.

Designed for real life, the Briar features a versatile frame that accommodates most mattress sizes and makes bed-making effortless.

This is more than a bed—it's the centerpiece of your collection. Choose from our array of customizable fabrics and leathers to create a piece that is uniquely yours. For a perfect match, we recommend ordering a material swatch.
title: The Briar Bed Artisan Crafted

description:
Elevate your outdoor oasis with the Amagansett Chaise Lounge. Expertly handwoven from all-weather resin wicker, this piece masterfully blends the organic beauty of natural rattan with superior durability. Supported by a rustproof aluminum frame, it's built to resist fading, mildew, and the elements for seasons to come.

Relax in unparalleled comfort atop our lofty, zippered cushions. Padded with high-resiliency, antimicrobial foam and wrapped in premium, bleach-cleanable InsideOut® Performance Fabric, they are designed to bounce back from use and repel moisture. The integrated elastic support system ensures your comfort lasts.

• Handwoven All-Weather Resin Wicker
• Rustproof Aluminum Frame & Feet
• Mold & Mildew Resistant Cushions
• InsideOut® Performance Fabric
• Easy to customize with replacement cushions and tailored covers.
title: Amagansett All Weather Chaise Lounge

description:
Sunbathe in style. The Sawyer lounge chair wraps you in handwoven wicker that looks like natural rattan yet laughs at rain, sun, and spills. Rustproof aluminum bones keep the frame feather-light and rock-solid for years of laid-back lounging.

Cushions built for poolside life: quick-dry, open-cell foam and recycled poly-fiber cores drain water in minutes, while breathable mesh bottoms stop mildew before it starts. Zip-off covers in fade-proof, bleach-cleanable performance fabric mean ketchup, sunscreen, and summer storms are no big deal.

Pair with the tailored Agora cover (sold separately) for off-season protection, then sit back and watch the sunset—this chair is ready whenever you are.
title: Sawyer All Weather Wicker Lounge Chair

description:
Meet the Ravine End Table, where rugged outdoor durability meets artisan craftsmanship. Expertly built from sustainably harvested Grade-A teak, its hand-applied wire-brushed finish reveals the wood's beautiful, natural grain and texture.

Left uncovered, your table will gracefully develop a unique silvery-grey patina. Teak’s natural oils make it incredibly resilient, repelling moisture, insects, and rot for a lifetime of easy care.
title: Ravine Teak Outdoor End Table

description:
Crafted by hand in Indonesia, our Rockport End Table blends artisanal texture with rugged durability. The Performance Weave polyester rope is meticulously woven around a frame of sustainably harvested, Grade-A teak wood, chosen for its natural strength and beauty.

This premium, unfinished teak boasts natural oils that repel moisture, insects, and rot. Its warm golden hue will gracefully weather to a soft silver-gray patina over time, developing a unique character with each knot and grain variation.

A stunning, low-maintenance piece built to last through every season.
title: Artisan Woven Teak End Table

description:
Pull up a martini—this feather-light side table is sculpted from glass-fiber-reinforced cement that laughs at rain, sun, and spills. A hand-applied color wash and satin topcoat give it the look of weathered stone without the weight.

Because each piece is artisan cast, no two tops share the same swirl of shade or hairline “age” marks; what you get is a one-off that gains character outdoors instead of wear. Sized for a single drink, book, or tiny plant, it tucks beside loungers, hammocks, or balcony chairs.

No cover? No problem—add a tailored Sur Last® sleeve (ask us) and leave it out year-round. 14 lbs, so a breeze can’t blow it, yet you can still lift it with one finger.
title: All Weather Martini Side Table

description:
Meet your outdoor space's new best friend. This high-performance pillow insert is built to withstand the elements, featuring a durable 100% polyester shell and filling with a reliable water-repellent finish. Rain or shine, it provides lasting comfort and resilience.

Rigorously tested for colorfastness and all-weather durability, it's the perfect foundation for your style. For the longest life, we recommend storing it indoors when not in use. Simply add your favorite outdoor pillow cover to complete your look.
title: All Weather Outdoor Pillow Insert

description:
Bring the forest indoors. This coffee table is cast from a real tree trunk in ultra-durable mineral concrete, then hand-bleached for a sun-kissed coastal vibe.

No two tables match: every whorl and crack is captured, polished glass-smooth, and sealed for life-proof shine. Expect a one-of-a-kind sculptural centerpiece that sparks conversation and survives red wine.

Ready to ship; no assembly required. Just unbox and level-up your living room.
title: Bleached Tree Trunk Concrete Coffee Table

description:
Meet the heart of your outdoor dining experience. Our Siena table is crafted from sustainably harvested teak, a hardwood celebrated for its incredible natural durability and timeless beauty.

Each table is finished by hand with a wire brush to create a beautifully textured, subtly distressed surface. Over time, the finish will gracefully fade to reveal teak's signature silvery-grey patina, ensuring your table only grows more character with every season.

Naturally resistant to moisture, insects, and rot, this table is built to withstand the elements and become a lasting centerpiece for countless gatherings.
title: Siena Teak Outdoor Dining Table

description:
Built like concrete, light like fiberglass. The Sedona end table shrugs off rain, sun, and spills while staying easy to move.

Each piece is hand-finished, so subtle color shifts and hairline cracks give your patio a one-of-a-kind accent—not a flaw in sight.

Pair with custom-fit Sur Last® covers to keep it pristine year-round.
title: Sedona Fiber Cement Side Table

description:
Sunbathe in style on the Lisboa, a double chaise built to outlast every season. Its cast-aluminum frame is welded for strength, then fitted with no-sag steel and elastic supports that flex just enough for cloud-like comfort.

Rain? No problem. Cushions are wrapped in quick-dry, open-cell foam made from recycled plastic and covered in fade-proof, bleach-cleanable InsideOut® fabric. Water drains away, air flows through, and the chaise is ready for lounging again in minutes.

Mix, match, or go minimal—configure your perfect outdoor retreat and leave the weather worries to us.
title: Lisboa Double Chaise Lounge

description:
Elevate your outdoor dining experience with the stunning Lakeshore Table. Its white faux marble tabletop, crafted from innovative glass fiber-reinforced concrete, offers the luxurious look of natural stone with exceptional durability and weather resistance.

Each table is a unique work of art, finished by hand with a water transfer technique that creates beautiful, one-of-a-kind grey veining. The sturdy grey concrete base is reinforced with an internal metal frame for unwavering stability.

Fully sealed with a protective clear coat, this table is built to resist scratches, stains, and the elements. Embrace the unique character of your piece, where subtle variations and natural imperfections tell its story.
title: Lakeshore White Marble Outdoor Dining Table

description:
Meet the Sedona: a sculptural coffee table built for open-air living. A fusion of glass fiber, sand, and cement creates a feather-light top that shrugs off rain, sun, and spills.

Each piece is hand-pigmented, sealed, and finished with a scratch-guard topcoat, so the surface only gets better with age—natural variations and hairline marks add story, not flaws.

Pair with tailored Sur Last® covers for year-round protection (ask our design team).
title: Sedona Fiber Cement Coffee Table

description:
Keep your Nantucket set showroom fresh. Sur Last® fabric—100% solution-dyed polyester—blocks UV, rain, and dust while letting furniture breathe, so cushions stay mildew-free and colors stay vivid.

Each cover is laser-cut for your exact Siena piece, then finished with stay-put straps and self-release buckles that snap tight in seconds and release even faster. Built in Mexico for coastal-grade durability and backed by a 3-year warranty against fading, seam failure, and zipper blowouts.

Need a custom sectional layout? Call 866.427.4287 or visit us in store—your perfect fit is ready to ship.
title: Tailored Nantucket Outdoor Furniture Covers

description:
Meet the Azura Chaise Lounge, engineered for unparalleled durability and comfort. Its core is built with marine-grade plywood—the same trusted material used in boat building—reinforced and weatherproofed to stand the test of time and elements.

Sink into luxury with our lofty, antimicrobial foam cushions wrapped in high-performance InsideOut® fabric. This eco-friendly, fade-resistant fabric is bleach-cleanable and built to resist mold and mildew. The set includes two toss pillows and a kidney pillow for ultimate relaxation.

Customize your look with replacement cushions available in different fabrics. Complete your outdoor sanctuary with tailored, resilient Sur Last® covers for ultimate protection.
title: Azura All Weather Outdoor Chaise Lounge

description:
Shield your Siena pieces in style. These made-to-fit covers slip on in seconds and lock tight with self-release buckles, keeping seats pristine through storms, sun and pollen season.

Woven in Mexico from 100% solution-dyed Sur Last® polyester, the fabric breathes to stop mildew yet blocks UV rays and driving rain. Color stays sharp year after year—backed by a 3-year warranty against fade, seam separation and zipper failure.

Need a custom sectional wrap? Call 866.427.4287 or visit us in store.
title: Tailored Sur Last Patio Furniture Covers

description:
Elevate your outdoor oasis with the Sorrento pillow cover, a unique piece woven from 100% recycled polyester yarn. This innovative process transforms post-consumer plastic into a beautifully soft and durable fabric, giving new life to beverage bottles and household containers.

Each cover features a soft wash finish, chic fringe detailing on all sides, and a convenient zip closure. Due to its handwoven nature, every piece boasts subtle variations in color saturation and tonality, ensuring your decor is truly one-of-a-kind.

Crafted for all-weather durability and rated for colorfastness, it's perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. For the complete look, pair it with our 23" x 23" Water-Repellent Outdoor Pillow Insert (sold separately). Made in India.
title: Sorrento Recycled Outdoor Pillow Cover

description:
Twirl into relaxation. Hand-woven polyester rope wraps a feather-light aluminum frame, giving you 360° views and weather-defying style.

The intricate vertical weave feels like linen, cleans like plastic, and laughs off rain, sun, and salt. A powder-coated finish locks out rust for seasons of swivel-powered lounging.

Ready to ship, no assembly required—just grab a cushion and spin.
title: Granada Swivel Rope Chair

description:
Give your Siena Living outdoor collection complete, custom-fit protection. These premium covers are expertly tailored to your specific furniture configuration, ensuring a sleek, secure fit that stays put in any weather.

Crafted from 100% solution-dyed Sur Last® polyester, our fabric is built to last. It’s fully waterproof and UV-proof to shield against rain and sun, yet breathable to prevent mildew. The fade-resistant material maintains its look season after season.

  • Secure fit with adjustable straps & self-release buckles
  • 3-year limited warranty against defects and fading
  • Made to order for sectional configurations
title: Amagansett Custom Outdoor Furniture Covers

description:
Turn plastic bottles into patio perfection. Hand-woven from 100% recycled polyester, this lumbar pillow feels cloud-soft yet survives sun, rain, and spilled sangria.

Tasseled corners, hidden zipper, and color variations make every cover one-of-a-kind. Sized 14" x 26"—pair with our water-repellent insert (sold separately) for instant, eco-friendly comfort.

Made in India. Rated for all-weather durability; store indoors during storms to keep colors singing.
title: Sarika Recycled Yarn Lumbar Pillow

description:
Meet the table that turns every sunset into a dinner party. Negril’s airy aluminum frame shrugs off rain, salt, and UV rays while staying cool to the touch on scorching days.

Precision welds and a powder-coated finish give it the muscle of wrought iron minus the weight—lift it with one hand, wipe it clean in seconds. A discreet umbrella port (plug included) pops open for shade and vanishes when you want a sleek, uninterrupted top.

Available in multiple sizes to squeeze onto a city balcony or anchor a poolside feast. Pair with our tailored covers for off-season protection—chat us for the perfect fit.
title: Negril Aluminum Patio Dining Table

description:
Experience cloud-like comfort with the Cyrus Chair. Its seat is generously cushioned with dense, plant-based foam and a luxurious blend of sterilized down and feathers, all wrapped in soft poly fiber for the ultimate sitting experience.

The innovative flexible elastic webbing in both the frame and backrest provides dynamic support that moves with you, while the sturdy spider base ensures smooth 360-degree rotation.

Sink into a throne of comfort and style designed for all-day relaxation.
title: Cyrus Plush Swivel Chair

description:
Meet the Grady Executive Desk, where heritage craftsmanship meets modern functionality. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted from reclaimed European oak and sustainably sourced solid oak, showcasing unique saw marks, cracks, and joint lines filled with elegant black resin. No two desks are exactly alike.

Our artisans hand-sand the surface and apply rich glazes to enhance the wood's natural grain, finishing with a protective matte lacquer. The result is a stunning, one-of-a-kind desk built to last.

Features include deep drawers with solid iron handles, smooth under-mounted glides, and a versatile file drawer that adjusts for both legal and standard folders.
title: Grady Artisan Executive Desk

description:
Sculpted reeded drawers and a bluestone or marble slab turn everyday work into a luxury experience. The Asher desk pairs craftsman-built oak or pine frames with reinforced mortise-and-tenon joints, so it stays rock-solid for years of late-night ideas.

A discreet center drawer—opened with a light-brass zinc pull—swallows laptops and notebooks, while hidden levelers keep the surface wobble-free on any floor. Choose Honey-finished European white oak or deep-toned Finnish pine; both are hand-stained, lacquered, and ready to mix with the full Asher collection.
title: Asher Reeded Oak Writing Desk

description:
Crafted from solid white oak with a hand-wire-brushed finish, the Atlas File brings organic texture and timeless character to your workspace. Its rich, hand-stained tones and dry-brushed lacquer create a beautifully aged appearance that feels both modern and heritage-inspired.

Designed for both form and function, it features smooth under-mounted glides on English dovetail drawers, accented by elegant brass pulls. The versatile file drawer effortlessly adjusts to accommodate both legal and letter-size folders.

As part of the modular Atlas office suite, this file cabinet can be purchased individually to create a custom home office layout that perfectly suits your needs.
title: Atlas Modular Oak File Cabinet

description:
Meet the Atlas Desk: a masterclass in organic modern design. Handcrafted from solid white oak and veneers, each piece features a unique wire-brushed finish that is hand-stained and sealed to achieve a beautifully aged, textural look.

This modular desk is the foundation of your perfect home office. Build your ideal workspace by pairing it with matching files and cabinets, all sold individually.

  • Integrated cord management compartment
  • Hand-stained, wire-brushed white oak
  • Part of a modular office suite
title: Atlas Modular Solid Oak Desk

description:
Command your office with the Dispatch Executive Desk, a masterfully crafted piece built from solid mindi wood. Its hand-applied, subtly distressed finish and warm brass hardware create a rich, timeless presence that speaks to refined taste.

This desk is a powerhouse of intelligent organization. It features lockable, adjustable file drawers, a hidden supply compartment, integrated media outlets, and a versatile leather writing surface. The expansive 78" top offers ample workspace, complemented by front shelving for display and storage.

Every detail is designed for durability and function, including full-extension drawer glides and a unique drop-down drawer front. Experience the perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern utility.
title: Dispatch Executive Desk Handcrafted Solid Wood

description:
Crafted from solid white oak, the Atlas desk pair brings heirloom quality to your daily grind. A hand-wire-brushed finish whispers of decades of stories, while hidden cable troughs keep today’s tech invisible.

Buy only what you need: the main desk, return, files and storage all stand alone, snapping together into a workspace that grows with you. No rules, just solid wood and clean lines.

  • Solid white oak & oak veneers
  • Hand-stained, wire-brushed finish
  • Built-in cord management
  • Modular pieces sold separately
title: Atlas Oak Modular Desk with Return

description:
Experience the pinnacle of craftsmanship with the Alaric Desk Chair. Hand-dyed, top-grain leather envelops a solid hardwood frame, built by artisans for enduring strength and timeless appeal.

Sink into sublime comfort. Generously padded with dense foam and supported by flexible rubber webbing, the seat and backrest offer a luxuriously supportive feel that lasts through even the longest days.

Designed for effortless movement and perfect positioning. The smooth pneumatic lift and swivel mechanism, combined with elegant brass casters, allow you to glide and adjust with ease.
title: Alaric Artisan Leather Desk Chair

description:
Meet the Grady File Cabinet, where history meets modern function. Expertly handcrafted from reclaimed European oak beams, each piece tells a unique story through its natural weathering, saw marks, and distinctive cracks elegantly filled with black resin.

Features two fully adjustable drawers to organize both legal and standard files, integrated cord management, and solid iron handles. Finished with a protective matte lacquer, this sustainable statement piece brings unparalleled character and artisan quality to your workspace.
title: Grady Reclaimed Oak File Cabinet

description:
Experience superior comfort with the Saylor Desk Chair. Its generously padded foam seat and backrest offer a plush, sink-in feel that supports you through long hours of work or study.

Crafted with a reinforced hardwood frame for lasting stability, this chair features a smooth 360-degree swivel and a height-adjustable design from 33.5\" to 37.4\" to perfectly fit your desk.
title: Saylor Ergonomic Swivel Desk Chair

description:
Meet the Dispatch Bookcase: a masterclass in handcrafted furniture. Built from solid Mindi wood and finished by hand, each piece features unique, artisanal distressing and is accented with gleaming solid brass hardware. This is more than storage; it's a statement of enduring style.

Designed for both beauty and function, it includes three adjustable shelves and smooth, full-extension drawer glides. With a generous 34\"W x 15\"D x 54.75\"H cavity, it offers ample space to display your favorite reads and treasures.

Key Features:
• Handcrafted from solid Mindi wood & veneers
• Three adjustable shelves (30 lb. capacity each)
• Distressed hand-applied finish & solid brass hardware
• Easy to clean with soap and water
title: Handcrafted Mindi Wood Bookcase

description:
Turn the handle and watch this desk rise from 30" to 42"—no motors, just smooth mechanical muscle. A crystal-clear tempered-glass top floats above rugged reclaimed-wood legs, marrying factory grit with gallery gloss.

Built to shoulder 250 lb of monitors, models, or midnight manuscripts, the steel crank still glides like butter. Pick the 47" compact or the 59" wide canvas and make standing or sitting your choice, not a chore.

Want a metal top instead? Chat us live and we’ll forge a custom piece from our recycled steel collection.
title: Crank Up Glass & Reclaimed Wood Desk

description:
Elevate your workspace with the Tatum Executive Desk, a masterpiece of form and function. Handcrafted by skilled Indonesian artisans from solid ash wood, this desk brings timeless elegance and enduring strength to your office.

The rich grain of the ash wood is protected by a clear lacquer finish, providing a durable surface with a beautiful, subtle sheen. Its crowning glory is the premium leather writing surface, offering a luxurious and tactile experience for every task.
title: Tatum Solid Ash Executive Desk

description:
Glide through your workday on Elise. A powder-coated aluminum frame gives this modern desk chair its sleek edge, while the smooth swivel and silent casters keep you effortlessly mobile.

Tap the lever and the hydraulic lift floats you to the perfect height, whether you're typing, sketching, or video-calling. Durable texture meets minimalist design—ready for home offices, studios, and creative corners.
title: Elise Swivel Desk Chair

description:
Turn the corner into command central. This sleek workstation hides a power strip, supply stash, and lockable legal/letter files inside a space-saving wedge that hugs walls and opens up floor space.

Write, charge, and file without leaving your seat: a leather-lined side drawer flips into a jotting surface, the center drawer drops for keyboard or tablet, and twin trays lift out to corral clutter. Finished in rich wood tones, it looks sharp from every angle—even when the cables and paperwork aren’t.

Quick specs: 75¾"W x 20"D return, 28"W opening, center drawer 16"D, 25"H clearance.
title: Dispatch Corner Desk with Hidden Storage

description:
Own a slice of European history. The Grady desk wraps a sleek waterfall silhouette in centuries-old oak rescued from weathered barn beams, so every saw mark and resin-filled crack tells its own story.

Hand-sanded, glazed, and sealed matte, the wood glows with depth that only time can create. Two soft-close drawers float on hidden glides, keeping your workspace calm and cable-free.

Available in Northman Oak, Sable, or Cinder finishes. Sustainably sourced solid oak and veneers complete the frame—no two desks ever match, but every one is built to last another hundred years.
title: Grady Reclaimed Oak Waterfall Desk

description:
Command your workday from a desk that means business. Solid white oak, wire-brushed and hand-stained, delivers heirloom strength with a timeworn soul. Brass pulls glide open four quiet drawers, while a hidden channel keeps cables invisible and your surface serene.

Designed to stand alone or anchor the full Atlas modular suite, this piece sits flush against the wall, turning even tight corners into executive territory. Build the office you deserve—one impeccable component at a time.
title: Atlas White Oak Executive Desk

description:
Meet the desk that makes work feel like a luxury. Warm walnut or oak tops float above a brass-kissed steel base, while shagreen-embossed leather panels add quiet texture under your fingertips.

Hand-stained hardwood, soft-close dovetail drawers, and a lacquer finish built for daily brilliance—this is craftsmanship you can see and feel. Choose Dark Walnut on parawood or Flemish Natural on solid oak; both arrive ready to elevate any room.

Note: Reconstituted leather surface is excluded from Worry-Free Protection Plan.
title: Callahan Walnut & Brass Writing Desk

description:
Handcrafted by Indonesian artisans, the Tatum desk turns solid ash into a workspace you’ll actually want to use. A clear lacquer finish lets the grain glow while shielding it from coffee rings and brainstorm scuffs.

The inset leather surface invites pen on paper, mouse on pad, or laptop on hide—no slip, no scratch, all style. One piece, zero assembly: just unbox and start creating.
title: Tatum Ash Wood Writing Desk with Leather Top

description:
Command your office with the Foundry Desk, a masterpiece of solid mahogany and ash crafted by hand in Indonesia. Sustainably sourced wood and solid iron hardware create a foundation of enduring quality and subtle rustic charm.

Each desk is unique, featuring the natural character of wood grain, small knots, and organic splits. These aren't flaws; they're a signature of its artisanal origin, ensuring your workspace tells a story all its own.
title: Foundry Executive Desk Handcrafted Mahogany
